work1.name: Server Engineer
work1.position: 火龍數位科技遊戲有限公司
work1.summary: This work involves the development and maintenance of mobile game servers using C++ in the Visual Studio 2022 environment along with the QT 5.15 framework. The focus is on creating and managing server-side components for mobile gaming applications.

work1.name: C++ Engineer
work1.summary: Utilize BCB 6 to Modify POS System.Assist customers in understanding the POS system, gather feedback, and relay it to the technical team. Set up POS products.

work1.name: Engineer
work1.position: 元照智能股份有限公司
work1.summary: This project involves crafting the overall architecture of user interface (UI) elements for medical devices using C++ in a Linux operating system environment with the Qt framework. Additionally, it includes the implementation of a backend system utilizing RTI_DDS (Real-Time Innovations Data Distribution Service).

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
